channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 2025 NFL Week 18 Buzz: Vikings Announce J.J. McCarthy As Week 18 Starter
item.description: Who's hurt? Who's practicing? Who's starting? Who's on the hot seat? Here's the latest on what's happening around the league entering Week 18.

item.title: Spain World Cup 2026 Preview: Best Players, Roster, History
item.description: Here's what you need to know about Spain's national team ahead of the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

item.title: 'Saturday Is Going to Speak for Itself': Seahawks-49ers NFC Title Race
item.description: The Seahawks and 49ers battle for the top seed in the NFC in Week 18, as winner claims home-field advantage and a first-round bye.

item.title: 'We Have to Win': NFC South on the Line in Week 18 Panthers-Buccaneers Matchup
item.description: The Panthers are one win away from their first NFC South title in 10 years, while the Buccaneers face a potential collapse.

item.title: Sources: Sorsby, top portal QB, to visit TTU, LSU

item.title: Ravens give 13-year vet NT Jenkins 1st extension
item.description: The Ravens and nose tackle John Jenkins have agreed to a one-year extension. It is the first contract extension in Jenkins' 13-year NFL career.

item.title: Diggs, Barmore decline to discuss facing charges
